listData.name: Up Everyday Account
listData.description: Up’s free everyday account for everyday use. This account comes with a debit card and supports Apple Pay and Osko.

features.additionalInfo: Pay with your Apple(TM) device using Apple Pay.
Pay with your Android(TM) device using Google Pay.
Pay with your Samsung(TM) device using Samsung Pay.
Pay with your Garmin(TM) device using Garmin Pay.
Pay with your Fitbit(TM) device using Fitbit Pay.
Customers can receive Apple or Android push notifications to their registered mobile devices, including transaction notifications and weekly summary notifications.
No fees for deposits to savers.
No fees for domestic ATM withdrawals or enquiries.
No fees for overseas ATM withdrawals.
Configure which types of transaction are enabled on the linked debit card.

fees.name: Emergency Replacement Cards
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when you request the emergency replacement of your Debit Mastercard lost or stolen overseas, within 72 hours of request.

fees.name: Sales Voucher Retrieval Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if we make a retrieval request for a Sales voucher for a non-PIN generated transaction and the retrieval request is withdrawn or determined as being a valid transaction.

fees.name: Audit Request
fees.additionalInfo: When you or your representative (for example, your accountant) request us to provide a written statement of your financial accounts with us.  (minimum charge $30.00)

fees.name: BPAY Transaction Trace Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you request us to trace a bill payment you have made through the BPAY scheme.

fees.name: BPAY transaction Recall Fee
fees.additionalInfo: When you request us to recall a bill payment you have made through the BPAY scheme.

fees.name: Pay Anyone Trace Fee (including Osko)
fees.additionalInfo: Applies to each direct entry transaction (including Osko) where a trace is requested by the customer to obtain information about the transaction made or received by the customer.

fees.name: International Inward Telegraphic Transfers (foreign)
fees.additionalInfo: Acceptance of payments in a foreign currency for SWIFT transfer into your account.

fees.name: International Inward Telegraphic Transfers (AUD)
fees.additionalInfo: Acceptance of payment in AUD currency for SWIFT transfer into your account.

fees.name: Domestic Inward Telegraphic Transfer
fees.additionalInfo: Acceptance of a payment from an Australian financial institution for fast transfer into your account.

fees.name: Domestic Telegraphic Transfer Return Request
fees.additionalInfo: Applies if you request the return payment of a telegraphic transfer.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The interest rate that applies on overdrawn amounts. We may calculate interest on the overdrawn amount on a daily basis, and debit it to your account half yearly for the Up Everyday Account, until the overdrawn amount is repaid.

detailData.name: Up Everyday Account
detailData.description: Up’s free everyday account for everyday use. This account comes with a debit card and supports Apple Pay and Osko.

listData.name: Up Saver
listData.description: Up’s competitive savings account. Up Savers are free to use, and they pay up to 4.10% p.a. interest. You can transfer money to and from your Up Savers and your Everyday Account as much as you like.

tiers.name: Combined Balance Limit
tiers.additionalInfo: Available on multiple Savers, up to a combined balance of $1,000,000.

depositRates.additionalValue: 5 or more successful card purchases per month from your Everyday Account. No monthly deposits required.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The interest rate that applies on overdrawn amounts. We may calculate interest on the overdrawn amount on a daily basis, and debit it to your account monthly for the UP Saver Account, until the overdrawn amount is repaid.

detailData.name: Up Saver
detailData.description: Up’s competitive savings account. Up Savers are free to use, and they pay up to 4.10% p.a. interest. You can transfer money to and from your Up Savers and your Everyday Account as much as you like.

listData.name: Up Home Loan
listData.description: Up Home is a simple loan that works seamlessly with your Up banking. Starting from 10% LVR, it’s first time owner friendly too. Use the Up features you love to own your own home faster.

features.additionalInfo: Apply for and manage your Up Home loan online through Up’s mobile banking application.
Use your Up spending account and Savers as offsets.

detailData.name: Up Home Loan
detailData.description: Up Home is a simple loan that works seamlessly with your Up banking. Starting from 10% LVR, it’s first time owner friendly too. Use the Up features you love to own your own home faster.
